attributes.action: HAND HELD PHONES IN TRANSPORT AND THE PENALTIES
attributes.additional_details:
WE THE UNDERSIGNED WANT THE PENALTY INCREASED ON USING A MOBILE PHONE TO THE EAR WHILE DRIVING, THE POINTS SHOULD BE INCREASED TO `6` AND A FINE OF £100 ALTHOUGH THIS IS THE TROUBLE WITH THE FINE AS MANY ARE COMPANY TRANSPORT AND THE FINE PAID FOR BY THEM, THESE PEOPLE CAUSE ACCIDENTS WITH SOME BEING FATAL, MOST TAKE NO NOTICE OF THE POLICE OR FINES/POINTS AT THIS TIME AS THE SYSTEM DOES NOT HURT ANYONE AS IT IS SHOWN THROUGH THE `STATS` PRODUCED, IF THE ABOVE STILL FAILS TO STOP THESE IDIOTS THEN THE HOME OFFICE SHOULD LOOK AT FURTHER INCREASES LIKE 9 POINTS AND £150 FINE TO GET THROUGH TO THEM AS BEING A `NO NO` AND SAVE LIVES AND ACCIDENT COSTS.

PLEASE SIGN IF YOU AGREE ON THE ABOVE, MAKES SENSE AS IT COULD BE YOUR FAMILY CAUGHT UP IN THIS ISSUE.
